alert.note: Alert for Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 16 at 9:33AM EST until February 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches, sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook County. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be extremely dangerous. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
